## Install

``` sh
pip install geography
```

## How to use

create a random geometric graph

``` python
rgg = RGG(5,0.1)
```

``` python
rgg.distance_matrix
```

    array([[0.        , 0.57886123, 0.73705664, 0.78457206, 0.49624727],
